casebody.data:
Bradley Lynn MAUNEY
v.
STATE of North Carolina No. 241P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 6, 2018 Bradley Lynn Mauney, for Mauney, Bradley Lynn. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, J. Douglas Henderson, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the application filed by Petitioner on the 6th of August 2018 in this matter for Writ of Habeas Corpus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Guilford County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of August 2018."
